items.sentence: Ask Tom where he wants you to put his suitcase.
I\'ve decided that I\'m going to shave my head.
I can\'t believe Tom made that kind of mistake.
Don\'t tell me you\'ve never been to Australia.
Why is Tom being so nice to me all of a sudden?
What\'s your favorite thing to have for supper?
What\'s your favorite way to exercise your dog?
I wonder whether Tom likes Chinese food or not.
Tom didn\'t believe what I told him about Mary.
You\'re a little taller than I am, aren\'t you?
I don\'t know how to eat sushi with chopsticks.
I don\'t want to hear anything you have to say.
Could you please say that once again in French?
Defensive driving can help you avoid accidents.
I only knew some of the people at Tom\'s party.
I only listen to heavy metal when I\'m driving.
Don\'t make me feel bad about doing what I did.
Tom just told his wife that he was leaving her.
Tom learned how to swim when he was very young.
All I need is about three hundred more dollars.
I\'m going to open the wine and let it breathe.
The train is supposed to leave in five minutes.
Everyone was just sitting around doing nothing.
Except for Tom, the whole family went swimming.
Are you sure that we\'ll be allowed to do that?
We can\'t let Tom walk. Let\'s give him a ride.
Everyone thinks Tom married Mary for her money.
Tom says that he was here in Boston that night.
Tom seems to be much taller than he used to be.
Tom doesn\'t like people who manipulate others.
Tom was flown by helicopter to a trauma center.
Calm down. I\'ll come over as soon as possible.
Tom left a message, but Mary didn\'t call back.
I\'d like to learn how to order food in French.
Don\'t you think it would be stupid to do that?
Tom wanted Mary to sign a prenuptial agreement.
I know that you don\'t care what happens to me.
I know that you weren\'t the ones who did that.
Tom didn\'t have the courage to try sky diving.
Tom didn\'t know Mary had never been to Boston.
Tom didn\'t know Mary had spent time in prison.
Tom didn\'t know Mary had to help John do that.
Tom didn\'t know Mary knew how to speak French.
One of the things Tom enjoys doing is swimming.
Tom got out of the bath and put his clothes on.
Tom has already decided when he wants to leave.
Tom has an emergency that has to be dealt with.
Wherever he may go, he is sure to make friends.
I haven\'t yet bought all the textbooks I need.
I haven\'t yet used the new hammer you gave me.
